thread.title: Sobering stories of drug addiction in West Virginia PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Sobering stories of drug addiction in West Virginia | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Sobering stories of drug addiction in West Virginia PBS NewsHour
text: In our NewsHour Shares video of the day, high schoolers from one of our Student Reporting Labs attended a community forum in West Virginia on drug addiction. They share some personal stories from community members on how addiction has affected their lives.
